EmailTemplate.description: Announcing updates to the tour form and launching account selector
EmailTemplate.name: Account selector and tour outcome form
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Changes to salesforce Tour outcome form and new feature
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week we are releasing a few new features!
Updated Tour Outcome The Tour Outcome Page is used in Salesforce by Sales and Community after a Tour has been completed. Here are the changes
New fields, for better reporting Better sync with Spacestation (Better Together) New UI
Click the link below for training guide https://docs.google.com/a/wework.com/presentation/d/1BW0I4vdd1W3fM6pm3pnlnF2J2M-RGyfCpAnKcZRHyXs/edit?usp=sharing
Click the link below for Video https://drive.google.com/a/wework.com/file/d/0BxnEtTaM6arTOGVwNjIwdS1CU00/view?usp=sharing
Account Selector What is the Account Selector Page?
The Account Selector page is a page in Salesforce that appears when converting a Lead into an Account/Contact/Opportunity. The page contains a list of existing accounts that are possible matches for the new record to be merged into.
The objective of the Account Selector page is to prevent the creation of duplicate Accounts by identifying and merging into existing records.
Click the link below for training guide https://docs.google.com/a/wework.com/presentation/d/1Kc5CT9S9FSCgRHqUBEFYKohhkXcvlBtDCsnm1jyHDZ8/edit?usp=sharing
Click the link below for Video https://drive.google.com/a/wework.com/file/d/0BxnEtTaM6arTdzVvZ2ZNN0FMUnc/view?usp=sharing
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Sincerely, Susie Romeo
